Package com.codename1.ads

The Ads API allows developers to add Ads to their apps

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdsService
    This is an abstract Ads Service.
    InnerActive
    This is an Ad service implementation by InnerActive see: http://console.inner-active.com/iamp/publisher/register?ref_id=affiliate_CodenameOne

Package com.codename1.ads Description

The Ads API allows developers to add Ads to their apps

Currently inner-active ads Network is supported please refer to inner-active for more information
